titleStmt.title: A testimony of antiquity shewing the ancient faith in the Church of England, touching the sacrament of the body and blood of the Lord here publickly preached, and also received in the Saxons time, above 600 years agoe.
Sermo de sacrificio in die Pascae. English
titleStmt.author: Aelfric, Abbot of Eynsham.
Joscelyn, John, 1529-1603.
Parker, Matthew, 1504-1575.
Lisle, William, 1579?-1637.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Aelfric. Cf. NUC pre-1956.

Published in 1566-1567 by Archbishop Parker and his secretary John Joscelyn; re-edited by William Lisle and published in 1623 as an appendix to his edition of the Saxon treatise concerning the Old and New Testament. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
